summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1156, for the improvement of Tenth Avenue West from Lee Street to Ray Street; Ninth Avenue West from Prospect Street to Ray Street; Eighth Avenue West from Howe Street to Ray Street; and Howe Street and Galer Street, each from Eighth Avenue West Tenth Avenue West; all in the City of Seattle, by constructing water mains, gates, tees, crosses, fire hydrants, and other appurtenances therein, under Ordinance No. 12925 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
